pkgmetadata.longdescription: Divide and Recombine for Large, Complex Data // Methods for dividing data into subsets, applying analytical methods to the subsets, and recombining the results. Comes with a generic MapReduce interface as well. Works with key-value pairs stored in memory, on local disk, or on HDFS, in the latter case using the R and Hadoop Integrated Programming Environment (RHIPE).
